Room.Name: Appleton Road/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Waterfront Way and Appleton Road.
Room.LongDescription: You are in a relatively minor intersection as Appleton Road is usually not a very traveled road. Appleton Road continues in a diagonal path to the southeast towards Golden Dolphin Way. Waterfront Way runs east and west from one end of town to the other.
